blocks.content:
Our current minimum rates are $35 standard charge rate or $30 discounted cash rate for the first 5 (five) kilometres.

> Up to 5km - $35 standard or $30 cash
>
> Up to 7km - $41 standard or $35 cash
>
> Up to 9km - $47 standard or $40 cash
>
> Up to 11km - $53 standard or $50 cash
>
> Up to 13km - $59 standard or $55 cash
>
> Over 13km - Standard Rates

We may charge $1.00 per minute waiting time, but give you 5 minutes free in order to say goodbye and leave your function.

We accept VISA, MASTERCARD, DINERS CLUB and TAXI CHARGE OR CHITS.

We do not have any EFTPOS facilities, but are happy to stop along the route at a ATM.

We do take advance bookings but require a credit card to hold the booking space. Should you cancel the booking within 1 (ONE) hour of booking time we will charge a standard cancellation fee.
